title: Degras Tyson Robbed's a drug dealer in Harlem's.
subtitle: Astrophysicist Neil Degras Tyson didn't tell a strange story about stealing a drug dealer from LSD when he explained the momentum of his career.
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: Neil Degras Tyson said that his interest in "stronic physics" stems from his experience of stealing and consuming large amounts of LSD as a young teenager in Harlem.
